branch.name: Branch Name
branch.title: Branch Management
connection.branchInfo: Note: If the branch doesn't exist, it will be created automatically when you push. Pull operations require the branch to exist.
connection.branchNote: Branch can be selected when pushing or pulling workflows
connection.connectDescription: Connect your workflow to a GitHub repository to enable version control, branching, and collaboration.
connection.deleteAllConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} GitHub connection(s)? This action cannot be undone.
connection.deleteAllDescription: Delete all GitHub connections for this app
connection.deleteAllPartial: Deleted {{success}} of {{total}} connection(s). Some deletions failed.
connection.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to disconnect this GitHub connection? This action cannot be undone.
connection.incompleteConnectionDescripti: This connection was not fully configured. Please select a repository or disconnect it.
connection.multipleConnectionsWarning: Warning: You have {{count}} connections for this app. Only one connection is used for push/pull operations. Consider disconnecting unused connections.
connection.newBranchWarning: Branch '{{branch}}' doesn't exist yet. It will be created automatically when you push.
connection.oauthComplete: GitHub authorization complete! Please select a repository to finish connecting.
connection.selectRepoDescription: Select the repository and branch to connect to:
pull.description: Pull workflow from GitHub repository. This will overwrite your local workflow.
pull.title: Pull Workflow from GitHub
pull.warning: This will overwrite your local workflow. Are you sure?
push.description: Push your current workflow to GitHub repository.
push.title: Push Workflow to GitHub
